title: Offices will never be the same
description:
For office workers, working from home generally went better than expected. Recode’s Rani Molla explains how a year of remote work will change office life, even as the Covid-19 pandemic subsides. Read Rani’s story here.


Host: Teddy Schleifer  (@teddyschleifer) 


Enjoyed this episode? Rate us ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐and leave a review on Apple Podcasts.


 Subscribe for free. Be the first to hear the next episode by subscribing in your favorite podcast app.
